creator: LvivLions
descriptionHtml:
💦 "Water color sort puzzle" is a simple, interesting and fun puzzle.

Easy, relaxing and fun game will bring you only positive emotions, as well as develop the brain.

Management:
• Touch the glass bottle from which you want to pour the liquid.
• Choose a second glass bottle to which you add a liquid of the same color.

Conditions:
• Only 4 colors (different or identical) can be poured into one bottle
• Filled glass can no longer be used. It is impossible to pour liquid from it.

💦 Your goal is to sort all the bottles by the appropriate watercolors and go through all the levels of difficulty and get the status of an Expert in the field of sorting glasses.

You will not be able to get away from this amazing color puzzle of sorting water, soda, balls. The game is suitable for all people, both small children and adult men who want to relax a little and feel happy.

💦 Enjoy this 3D puzzle, develop your IQ, be ready for interesting, exciting levels throughout the game in colored water adventure.

You can control only one finger, so it is very convenient when you are in a minibus, bus, or just go to work in the subway. Sort watercolor soda, you can anywhere and anytime.

FEATURES
- A huge number of levels. Over time, their number will only increase.
- No coins, everything is free.
- Water soft.
- You can play both with the Internet (WiFi, 3G) and without it.
- Maximum freedom of choice.
- There are no time limits.
- Relaxing music and fun sounds.
- Fabulous graphics, fun, great controls.
- Watercolors soft PRO.

You haven't started the game yet? It's time to start the color sorting puzzle into test tubes or tubes. Quickly combine and sort colored water, soda, watercolor into test tubes of the same color.

Take responsibility and go through all the puzzles and become the mega king of water, soda and watercolors. And for this you do not need the Internet, WiFi, 3G, or any other connection.

💦 "Watercolors sort puzzle PRO" is absolutely free and does not require Internet access. Play anywhere and anytime!
descriptionShort: Water Color Sort Puzzle PRO - new FREE watercolor soft game Sorting 2021
